name: Le Mandrie di San Paolo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Le Mandrie for only two days. We were greeted by Andrea whose family owns the farm. He speaks very good English and is very helpful. He seems to work from early morning to late evening, often acting as server in the dining room at dinner. The rooms are spacious, spotless, comfortable, and look out over the entire valley. The food was excellent, with breakfast treats and an evening menu which is varied and delicious. The only down side is the difficulty in finding the agritourismo and the steep hillside on which it is perched. They have just added a very modern pool facility and run a first class operation.
reviews.title: Great place to relax

description: Le Mandrie Di San Paolo offers wonderful panoramic views over Assisi and the Umbrian hills and it is located at 700m in the Natural Parc of Subasio.There is a very nice restaurant serving typical regional dishes.The outdoor infinity pool offers a wonderful panoramic views over Assisi and the valley. The historic centre of Assisi is just a 5/10 minute car ride away.Rooms have a balcony and private bathroom, some have a separate seating area and kitchenette. Spa center and relaxing garden.Free parking.
